meta.content: Mariana Bracetti Academy Charter School is a K-12 charter school serving children in Philadelphia. We are a recognized peer leader and annually among the best schools in Pennsylvania according to US News & World Report.
School | Mariana Bracetti Academy Charter School | Philadelphia

Mariana Bracetti Academy Charter School is a K-12 charter school serving children in Philadelphia. We are a recognized peer leader and annually among the best schools in Pennsylvania according to US News & World Report.

p.span: A Community of Passionate Educators and Learners

span.span: WELCOME TO MARIANA BRACETTI ACADEMY CHARTER SCHOOL

p.span: Mariana Bracetti Academy was founded in 1999 and opened its doors in the year 2000.

All students draw upon their passion, motivation and life experience to become independent, adaptive problem solvers, powerful thinkers, effective communicators, and meaningful contributors to the larger community. Our school community is committed to leveraging every resource to ensure all students are prepared for college and career success.

The student experience at Mariana Bracetti Academy Charter School includes a diverse range of cultures, curricula, and extracurricular activities. We offer many options for our students to choose from, making them directly involved in designing their own educational path which meets the high standards of our core curriculum. There’s so much for students to do and experience here.

The parent experience at Mariana Bracetti Academy Charter School is one of common goals and partnership. At MBA we will meet your child wherever they are at and work hand in hand with you to see them achieve their full potential. You will find many opportunities to get involved in your child's education and participate in family activities throughout the school year.

span.span: MBA LISTED AS A TOP HIGH SCHOOL BY US NEWS & WORLD REPORT
CLASS OF 2019 EARNS OVER 7.1 MILLION IN SCHOLARSHIPS
MBA GRADUATES 100% OF SENIORS TWO YEARS IN A ROW

p.span: Mariana Bracetti Academy Charter School is a publicly funded K-12 charter school and free to attend. Students from Pennsylvania may apply with preference given to siblings of current students and residents of Philadelphia.

Admission is based upon a random lottery system. Parents are encouraged to apply for their children between September 20, 2019 and January 27, 2020 for the 2020-21 school year. Lottery applications may be submitted on-line through applyphillycharter.org.
